title: Looking to buy a PSA graded T206 Heinie Wagner bat on right shoulder!
author: splinter

posts.post_title: Looking to buy a PSA graded T206 Heinie Wagner bat on right shoulder!
posts.post_content:
Hey guys, need a little help!  I am one card away from finishing the T206 Red Sox set.  I just need a Heinie Wagner bat on right shoulder, looking for PSA.  Preferably around a 2-3.  Please help me finish this one up!!


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

To the top, anybody have a Heinie right shoulder?
